channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for LA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for LA

item.title: Report E-2025010076
item.description:
Report E-2025010076

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-08T18:17:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-06
  • City: SCOTT
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO-Logistics contacted ERTS regarding two punctured leaking 55-Gallon DM’s containing hazardous product, EMBR12085A. A contractor dispatched and observed an estimated 30-Gallon release onto the concrete dock floor in a 10’ x 10’ area as a result of dunnage. The contractor applied oil dry to the release and overpacked both drums into 95-Gallon DF’s. The impacted absorbents, PPE, and pallet pieces were containerized into one 55-gallon DF. All waste was left on-site for XPO to manage. No storm-drains, waterways, or soil were involved in this response.
